tool_description: Creates and manages event invitations for donors including RSVP tracking, reminder sequences, and attendance coordination.

event_date.description: Date and time of the event

event_location.description: Event venue or virtual meeting details

invitee_list.description: List of donor IDs to invite

invitation_method.description: Method of invitation delivery: email, mail, phone, or mixed

max_attendees.description: Maximum number of attendees for the event

dietary_options.description: Whether to collect dietary restriction information

error_messages: Invalid event date: event_date must be in the future and in valid date-time format.
Invalid RSVP deadline: rsvp_deadline must be before event_date.
Empty invitee list: invitee_list must contain at least one valid donor ID.
Invalid invitation method: invitation_method must be one of: email, mail, phone, mixed.
Venue capacity exceeded: max_attendees cannot exceed venue capacity limits.
Invitee limit exceeded: Cannot invite more than 2000 people to a single event.
usage: Provide event_name, event_date, event_location, invitee_list, invitation_method, and rsvp_deadline. Optionally set max_attendees, send_reminders, and dietary_options. Returns invitation tracking and RSVP management system.

event_summary.description: Summary of event invitation details and status
